name: communitycar-web
description: Frontend tooling for CommunityCar ASP.NET Core MVC

scripts.build:css: postcss Styles/core.css -o wwwroot/css/core.min.css && postcss Styles/layout.css -o wwwroot/css/layout.min.css && postcss Styles/components.css -o wwwroot/css/components.min.css && postcss Styles/features.css -o wwwroot/css/features.min.css
scripts.watch:css: concurrently "npm run watch:core" "npm run watch:layout" "npm run watch:components" "npm run watch:features"
